shape_3_per_frame1=i=2*instance;
shape_3_per_frame2=
shape_3_per_frame3=x=gmegabuf(i);   y=gmegabuf(i+1);
shape_3_per_frame4= 
shape_3_per_frame5=zoom=.5;
shape_3_per_frame6=x= .5+zoom*x/q6;
shape_3_per_frame7=y= .2+zoom*y;
shape_3_per_frame8=
per_frame_init_1=i=0;   
per_frame_init_2=loop(10000,  gmegabuf(i)=0;
per_frame_init_3=i=i+1;);
per_frame_init_4=
per_frame_init_5=t=300;
per_frame_1=chng=sin(time*.5);
per_frame_2=cthr=.9999;
per_frame_3=mq21=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq21);
per_frame_4=mq22=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq22);
per_frame_5=mq23=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq23);
per_frame_6=mq24=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq24);
per_frame_7=mq25=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq25);
per_frame_8=mq26=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq26);
per_frame_9=mq27=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1),mq27);
per_frame_10=mq28=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1),mq28);
per_frame_11=mq29=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1)*.3,mq29);
per_frame_12=mq31=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1)*.3,mq31);
per_frame_13=monitor=chng;
per_frame_14=q21=mq21;q22=mq22;q23=mq23;q24=mq24;q25=mq25;q26=mq26;
per_frame_15=q27=mq27;q28=mq28;q29=mq29;q31=mq31;
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=monitor=mq1;
per_frame_18=vol=bass+treb+mid;
per_frame_19=atime=atime+vol;
per_frame_20=q11=.4+sin(atime*.006        )*.4;
per_frame_21=q12=.4+cos(atime*.00613828348)*.4;
per_frame_22=q13=.4+sin(atime*.00598593455)*.4;
per_frame_23=monitor=q13;
per_frame_24=q4=sin(atime*.03);
per_frame_25=q5=cos(atime*.030383824);
per_frame_26=q6=tan(atime*.029384834);
per_frame_27=
per_frame_28=wave_a=0;   warp=0;        decay=0;   
per_frame_29=zoom=1;     q6=aspecty;    t=t+.5/fps;
per_frame_30=
per_frame_31=
per_frame_32=/// iterative equations
per_frame_33=
per_frame_34=x=0;   y=0;   i=0;
per_frame_35=
per_frame_36=loop(1024,           sample=i/1024;
per_frame_37=
per_frame_38=s=6.28*sample;    p=(5*sample)%5;    p1=p*6.28/(.2+.01*sin(2*t));
per_frame_39=
per_frame_40=x = x + (1-sample) * sin(p1+t*s);
per_frame_41=y = y + (1-sample) * cos(p1-t*s) ;
per_frame_42=
per_frame_43=gmegabuf(2*i)=x;       gmegabuf(2*i+1)=y;
per_frame_44=
per_frame_45=i=i+1;);
per_frame_46=
per_frame_47=q30=(bass+treb+mid)*2;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_6=`                      ((uv.xyy*q27
warp_7=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_8=`                      ).xyz*
warp_9=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_10=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q29
warp_11=`                     );
warp_12=`if(ret.x> q21*q13         && ret.x<= q24*q11        )ret.y += (noise9).x*.5; 
warp_13=`if(ret.y> q22*q11         && ret.y<= q25*q12        )ret.z += (noise9).y*.5; 
warp_14=`if(ret.z> q23*q12         && ret.z<= q26*q13        )ret.x += (noise9).z*.5; 
warp_15=`    float3 ret2 = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_16=`    
warp_17=`    ret.x = tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*1.00+0.5 ).x;
warp_18=`    ret.y = tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*0.9+0.5 ).y;
warp_19=`    ret.z = tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*1.15+0.5 ).z;   
warp_20=`
warp_21=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_22=`    ret *= 0.80; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_23=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`ret = tex2D(sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*1.3+0.5).xyz;
comp_4=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
comp_5=`                      ((uv.xyy*q28
comp_6=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
comp_7=`                      ).xyz*
comp_8=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
comp_9=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q31
comp_10=`                     );
comp_11=`if(ret.x> q26*q13         && ret.x<= q23*q11        )ret.z -= (noise9).x*.5; 
comp_12=`if(ret.y> q25*q11         && ret.y<= q22*q12        )ret.x -= (noise9).y*.5; 
comp_13=`if(ret.z> q24*q12         && ret.z<= q21*q13        )ret.y -= (noise9).z*.5; 
comp_14=`ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*1.275+0.5).xyz); 
comp_15=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, (uv-.5)*1.25+.5).xyz);
comp_16=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*1.225+0.5).xyz);
comp_17=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*1.2+0.5).xyz);
comp_18=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*1.175+0.5).xyz); 
comp_19=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*1.15+0.5).xyz);
comp_20=`ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*1.125+0.5).xyz); 
comp_21=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*1.1+0.5).xyz);
comp_22=`ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*0.+1.075).xyz);  
comp_23=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*1.05+0.5).xyz);
comp_24=`ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*1.025+0.5).xyz);  
comp_25=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz);
comp_26=`ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*0.975+0.5).xyz);  
comp_27=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*0.95+0.5).xyz); 
comp_28=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*0.925+0.5).xyz); 
comp_29=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*0.9+0.5).xyz); 
comp_30=`    
comp_31=`    ret *= ret;    
comp_32=`
comp_33=`   float lum = lum(ret);
comp_34=`   ret = lerp(ret, pow( lum, 0.4 + 1.6*rand_preset.xyz ), 0.7);
comp_35=`
comp_36=`}
